column5: Anyone know where I can purchase Hali Sukkula jigs. Picked up a few at Bass Pro years ago but they don't carry them anymore. Thanks so much...Jeff
Picked up a few Hali's at ANgling Specialties in Mississauga....don't know which model...but if you're close to him, check it out

I am also looking for these jigs.  Do you have an address for that store?  Google comes up with three different places.  Do you know if they are all the same chain/owner?  I assume this is it? 325 Central Parkway West Mississauga, ON L5B 3X9 (905) 275-4972  Thanks.
Thanks Johnnyb I will give them a shout..
Yep, all owned by the same peeps.
Sorry for being slow on the draw, but yes, as the great and mighty Drifter confirmed....they'ze be on Central Parkway right there in the heart of Missy-sogga
Thanks.  I hadn't realized they had three locations.  The one in Concord isn't that far from me.  Definitely going to be making a visit soon.
